channel.title: Review on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Review on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Bigger, Leaner, Stronger
item.description: by Michael Matthews (goodreads link) Good overview over the main fitness topics: mental condition, willpower, social pressure eating (habits), calories, macros general concepts of a training plan for hobby lifter compound movements: squat, deadlift, benchpress, overhead press. a little short, but as an introduction it should be enough. links to online videos are given. supplement overview. what helps, what not, in which doses. overall good introductions without much depths.
